page.title: 12EAGLESHAM PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: tig,skipping,british bulldogs,football and man hunt and their least favourite game was cowboys and indians.At 12:00pm the infants go for school lunches and at 12:30pm the elder children go for their lunches.We found out that their favourite meal was fish and chips and their favourite sweet is caramal flan.Each dinner costs 58p.The school has various recording equipment for recording radio programmes and we have a video for recording television programmes.We have new equipment like our two computers and the casiotone. We also have film eqiupment for showing films and slides and a selection of musical instruments. Tuesday is club day we have a selection of different clubs baking,chess,woodwork,clay and badminton(we were third in the league).The school also has a
